title: Last Chain On Billie: How One Extraordinary Elephant Escaped the Big Top
description: Against the backdrop of a glittering but brutal circus world, Last Chain on Billie charts the history of elephants in America, the inspiring story of the Elephant Sanctuary, and the spell-binding tale of Billie--a resilient elephant who defied the system even as she struggled to overcome a life of abuse and never lost sight of the life she was meant to have.
author: Carol Bradley
